# Sola - Precision File Conversion Suite
> Built by Gregorious Creative Studios. A premium, client-side file conversion platform with 20+ tools for PDF, image, audio, and text processing. All files are processed locally in the browser — nothing is uploaded to any server.

## About
Sola is a free, browser-based file conversion suite. It provides professional-grade tools for converting, editing, merging, splitting, compressing, and securing PDF documents, images, and audio files. Privacy-first: all processing happens client-side using WebAssembly and JavaScript — no files ever leave the user's device.

## Tools

### PDF Tools
- PDF to Word: Convert PDF documents to editable Word (.docx) files
- Word to PDF: Transform Word documents into stable PDF format
- PDF to PowerPoint: Turn PDFs into editable presentation slides
- PDF to Excel: Extract tables from PDF into spreadsheet format
- Excel to PDF: Convert spreadsheets to PDF documents
- PowerPoint to PDF: Convert presentations to PDF format
- Merge PDF: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document
- Split PDF: Extract specific pages or split PDF into multiple files
- Compress PDF: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality
- Rotate PDF: Permanently rotate PDF pages (90, 180, 270 degrees)
- Edit PDF: Full-featured PDF editor with text detection, drawing, shapes, highlights, eraser, and image insertion
- PDF to JPG: Convert PDF pages to high-quality JPG images

### Security Tools
- Unlock PDF: Remove password protection from PDF files
- Encrypt PDF: Add password protection to PDF documents
- Sign PDF: Add digital signatures to documents

### Image Tools
- Image to PDF: Convert images (JPG, PNG, WebP) to a single PDF
- Remove Background: Automatically extract subjects from images
- JPG to PNG: Convert JPG images to PNG format with transparency support
- PNG to JPG: Convert PNG images to compressed JPG format
- HEIC to JPG: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to standard JPG format

### Text & Audio Tools
- OCR to Text: Extract text from scanned documents using Tesseract.js OCR
- Audio to Text: Transcribe audio recordings to text using Whisper AI

## Technology
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite
- PDF Processing: pdf-lib (editing), PDF.js (rendering)
- OCR: Tesseract.js (client-side)
- Audio Transcription: Whisper (via ONNX Runtime Web)
- All processing: 100% client-side, no server uploads
